title: YouTube global outage: Google issues update, says 'still working on a full fix'
snippet: YouTube faced a major global outage, disrupting video access across India and the US, as Google blamed a recommendations system issue and worked on a full fix.

title: AWS, Cloudflare down? Users report outage, Amazon denies disruption
snippet: According to the Downdetector website, over 1,100 users in the United States reported an AWS outage on Tuesday night (local time). However, Amazon Web Services in a statement on X denied the reports.

title: YouTube down? Users report disruptions on video platform; netizens ask ‘how am i supposed to have dinner’
snippet: YouTube down today: YouTube has not yet issued a statement regarding the issue. It was immediately not clear why the YouTube outage had occurred.

title: AI Summit 2026 LIVE Updates: Day 3 of expo to begin today amid focus on innovation and AI applications
snippet: Delhi AI Summit 2026 LIVE: Today is Day 3 of the five-day event scheduled till 20 February. With 13 country pavilions the event will see participation of Heads of states and governments, Ministers, foreign delegates, and international organisation representatives.

title: Nvidia partners Reliance, L&T, TCS, others for GPU infra at AI Summit
snippet: Nvidia's partnerships come at a time when India’s $283-billion IT services industry is under pressure from foundational AI companies such as OpenAI and Anthropic.

title: Quote of the day by Stephen Hawking: ‘The rise of powerful AI will be....'
snippet: Stephen Hawking’s warning on AI’s promise and peril resonated at the India AI Impact Summit 2026, where leaders highlighted connectivity, governance and responsible innovation as key to ensuring AI drives inclusive growth rather than unchecked risk.

title: AI will drive down filmmaking costs and usher in new talent, says filmmaker Shekhar Kapur
snippet: Filmmaker Shekhar Kapur says artificial intelligence will slash filmmaking costs and empower a new generation of storytellers. Speaking at the India AI Impact Summit 2026, he called AI a democratic force that can boost creativity, widen access and drive economic growth in India.

title: When is Bill Gates speaking at the AI Impact Summit 2026 in New Delhi? All you need to know
snippet: Confusion erupted over Bill Gates’ participation at the AI Impact Summit in New Delhi after conflicting statements from government sources and his foundation. As speculation grew, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang also pulled out, while Gates continued his India visit in Andhra Pradesh.
